mapper.select: SELECT c.board_no, c.comment_no, c.comment_content, e.employee_name AS comment_write, c.comment_date, e.rank_name AS rankName, e.department_name AS departmentName FROM comments c JOIN board b ON c.board_no = b.board_no JOIN employees e ON b.employee_no = e.employee_no WHERE c.board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( comment_no, comment_content, comment_write, comment_date, board_no, company_code ) VALUES ( comm_seq.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, #{commentWrite}, SYSDATE, #{boardNo}, #{companyCode} )
